actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 and the Tariff Schedules of the United States to reduce the burden of paperwork involved in the customs entry process for travelers and goods entering the United States.

summary.text: Customs Paperwork Reduction Act - Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States and the Tariff Act of 1930 to increase from $250 to $500 the value of merchandise which may be imported for personal use or as gifts, and which are subject to customs duty of ten percent of the retail value rather than other rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 and the Tariff Schedules of the United States to reduce the burden of paperwork involved in the customs entry process for travelers and goods entering the United States.
